mapper.sql: id, article_id, user_id, content, parent_id, mention_user_id, like_count, is_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_exchange_comment (article_id, user_id, content, parent_id, mention_user_id, like_count, is_deleted, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{parentId}, #{mentionUserId}, #{likeCount}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_exchange_comment WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT c.id, c.article_id, c.user_id, c.content, c.parent_id, c.mention_user_id, c.like_count, c.create_time FROM t_exchange_comment c WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT c.id, c.article_id, c.user_id, c.content, c.parent_id, c.mention_user_id, c.like_count, c.create_time FROM t_exchange_comment c WHERE c.article_id = #{articleId} AND c.is_deleted = 0
AND c.parent_id = #{parentId}
AND c.parent_id IS NULL
ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
